comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Dahlgren Hall. See, for example, www.flickr.com/photos/saefken/275950115/. Also known as the Armory, see www.loc.gov/chroniclingamerica/lccn/sn85066387/1907-11-17... for 1907 pictures of the Naval Academy.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you swanq. We'll add this information to the title next time we update this record.
